channel.title: Help please cant connect whonix workstation/gateway to internet or any other vm using the gateway
channel.description:
just downloaded whonix not to long ago and set it up but right when i went on the web i couldn't connect to anything. After that i found some fourm on here to check on updates with checkwhonix so i did and it turned up that it did need updates so i tried to install but this is what came up on the terminal.
user@host:~$ apt-get-update-plus dist-upgrade Reading package lists... E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/apt/lists/lock - open (13: Permission denied) E: Unable to lock directory /var/lib/apt/lists/ W: Problem unlinking the file /var/cache/apt/pkgcache.bin - RemoveCaches (13: Permission denied) W: Problem unlinking the file /var/cache/apt/srcpkgcache.bin - RemoveCaches (13: Permission denied) any help is appreciated

item.title: Help please cant connect whonix workstation/gateway to internet or any other vm using the gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Missing sudo.

sudo apt-get-update-plus dist-upgrade

See also:

whonix.org – 28 Oct 19

Operating System Software and Updates - Whonix

Operating System Software and Updates

Read full topic
item.source: Help please cant connect whonix workstation/gateway to internet or any other vm using the gateway

item.title: Help please cant connect whonix workstation/gateway to internet or any other vm using the gateway
item.dc:creator: Wannabehacker666
item.description:
just downloaded whonix not to long ago and set it up but right when i went on the web i couldn’t connect to anything. After that i found some fourm on here to check on updates with checkwhonix so i did and it turned up that it did need updates so i tried to install but this is what came up on the terminal.

user@host:~$ apt-get-update-plus dist-upgrade
Reading package lists…
E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/apt/lists/lock - open (13: Permission denied)
E: Unable to lock directory /var/lib/apt/lists/
W: Problem unlinking the file /var/cache/apt/pkgcache.bin - RemoveCaches (13: Permission denied)
W: Problem unlinking the file /var/cache/apt/srcpkgcache.bin - RemoveCaches (13: Permission denied)
any help is appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: Help please cant connect whonix workstation/gateway to internet or any other vm using the gateway
